summary: A unit‑test module that exercises the AnimateDiffSparseControlNetPipeline, checking that its configuration, components, and optimizations (attention slicing, device/dtype handling, batch vs single inference, prompt embeddings, IP‑adapter integration, motion UNet loading, VAE slicing, and xformers attention) work correctly.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability, compatibility, and performance of the AnimateDiff sparse control diffusion pipeline for production use, validating that it functions across different hardware settings and integrates advanced features such as IP‑adapter and motion models.
